       "The IMDb Show": Alan Tudyk, His Top 5 Star Wars Droids, and Denzel's Dream Role         Alan Tudyk  ranks his top five droids and shares what's on his weekend watchlist. We also talk with the cast of  Roman J. Israel, Esq. , and share our favorite Thanksgiving TV episodes.                                    "The IMDb Show": Alan Tudyk and Denzel Washington                                     Weekend Watchlist for the Week of Nov. 24                      Watch more of the show
